name: FindShop
author: FindShop.co

sections.description:
FindShop offers a free woo-commerce plugin to collect genuine customer reviews.

Features & Benefits:

  • Business Listing Page – Showcase reviews, offers & featured products to users looking for your business and drive more traffic to your website.

  • Collect Reviews – Collect ratings & reviews by sending automated personalized review request emails to customers after they make a purchase.

  • Customer Service – Get insights from your customers and improve your service areas. Acknowledge & reward customers for providing reviews to win customer trust.

  • Social Media Integration – Share happy customer reviews on social media pages to promote your brand with social media followers and bring them to your website.

  • Website Widgets – Embed website widgets to display reviews and ratings on your website. Boost visitor confidence and drive sales.

  • Increase Conversions – Create offers, discounts and easily share them on listing & social media pages. Add featured products and upsell them through review request emails.

How it works?

  1. Sign-up
  2. Collect reviews
  3. Share on social media
  4. Track performance

Benefits

  • Improved SEO
  • Increased sales conversions
  • Google rich snippet improves click through rate (CTR)
  • More traffic from social media due to automated review sharing
  • Get better insights from customer reviews and improve service
  • Build credibility & user trust

Statistics that prove why any business should collect customer reviews:

  1. More than 90% consumers look at online reviews before making an online purchase.
  2. Customers spend 31% more when a business has positive reviews.
  3. Displaying reviews can increase conversion rates by 270%
sections.installation:
Requires Woo-commerce version 2.4.0 or higher.

Instructions:

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/findshop directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Go to WooCommerce Settings > FindShop and add the API keys (Sign-up for free account on FindShop by visiting https://www.findshop.co/biz)
sections.faq:
Is it free?

Yes, we offer forever free plan. You also get access to premium features for 7 days during sign-up.

How can get support?

Please contact us on biz@findshop.co for any queries or help. You can also raise support ticket from control panel.
